name: Fighter's Resolve
description: When you use a Tactical Die, you gain the following benefit:\\n- Assault: The Attack deals +1 damage.\\n- Deflect: If the Attack misses, you can choose 1 creature within 1 Space of you, that creature takes 1 damage of the damage type of the attack.

name: Creative Combatant
description: When you make a Physical Save or Check in Combat, you can use a Tactical Die and add it to your Save or Check.

name: Adrenaline Boost
description: When you use your Second Wind, you gain +5 to your next Attack.

name: Cut Through
description: Whenever you land a Heavy Hit with a weapon Attack, you ignore the target's Physical Damage Reduction

name: Unyielding Spirit
description: While Bloodied, you gain 1 Temp HP at the start of each of your turns.
